title: X is unbearable when strong, and useless when weak

replies.body: Perhaps, but there are a few like "Champ Z" who is unbearable when strong, and still dangerous when weak.
Nah more like "X is too strong with this item, let's rework the item instead" *cries in Diana main with runeglaive and kills Ezreal twice*

I don't quite no why but after reading your post, I really want to make some {{champion:77}} bear puns, but I to shy to come out of my shell. Hopefully some folks out there with the heart of tiger will step up and take a swipe at it for me.
{{champion:26}} Time lords HATE this man!!!~~bearpig~~ Find out how he got pstd from {{champion:106}}  for 499.99!! Timetraveling and bears not included and may cause tilting off the Earth.
